caption.p: In vitro anti-collagenase activity of Plectranthus spp. (A) Organic extracts at 100 g/mL. (B) Aqueous extracts at 100 g/mL. (C) Isolated compounds at 100 g/mL. The results are presented as means percentage values, considering the absorbance of EGCG as the positive control. Data are expressed as the mean ± SD ( n = 3) *** p < 0.0001 vs negative control (DMSO 0.3% (v/v) in Tricine buffer). DMSO: dimethyl sulphoxide; EGCG: epigallocatechin gallate; ns: not significant; SD: Standard Deviation. Values were determined by one-way ANOVA followed by Tukey HSD comparison test.
